column4: Hi, i need help getting my linksys usb adapter to work in ubuntu

Hi, i need help getting my linksys usb adapter to work in ubuntu
Hi, i need help getting my linksys usb adapter to work in ubuntu
you would get more help if you described the problem.
it's a wusb54gc, the connectivity is complete shit and i was unable to install drivers with ndiswrapper
and it works fine in windows 7 right now
by "complete shit", do you mean it connects, but easily loses connectivity?
it says it connects, but it cant open a webpage
or it will open like one webpage in 5 mins
what do i do with that
takes a long time, or literally 5 minutes?
literally 5 mins
it fails to load pages a lot
its unusuable
was it working better previously, or is the first time trying it in linux?
first time
i think its possible that i was doing ndiswrapper wrong/ using the wrong drivers
i have not
I guess it's not available for testing right now, eh?
ayecee:what?
that is, you're in windows right now, not in linux, so if I suggest some troubleshooting, you couldn't do it without rebooting.
